Class VisualizationPlot

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.lmu.ifi.dbs.elki.visualization.svg.SVGPlot
      • de.lmu.ifi.dbs.elki.visualization.gui.VisualizationPlot
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    DetailView

    public class VisualizationPlot
extends SVGPlot
    SVG plot that allows visualization to schedule updates.
    Since:
    0.7.0
    Author:
    Erich Schubert
